Flow.description: Boat Appraisal Sheet into a Flow
Flow.label: Boat Appraisal

fields.name: whatAreWeAppraisingTitle
fields.fieldText: Hi {!FlowUserFirstName}, Please select the items you'd like to appraise.

fields.name: Warning
fields.fieldText: The statements made on this appraisal are true & accurate to the best of my knowledge. I understand and agree that this appraisal is approximate only & subject to a visual & running inspection or any adjustment due to any false criteria as described above on value by Legend Boats (Duhamel and Dewar Inc.) as being absolute and just & must be agreed to by both parties. Customer is responsible to pay for any repairs and the remedy any issues or problems not described above or a new trade value would have to be determined between both parties.

fields.name: Problems_with_Current_Boat_Package
fields.fieldText: Are there any problems that currently exist with your boat package?

fields.name: Family_Friend_Boat_Value
fields.fieldText: If you were to sell your boat to family or friends, what would you ask for it?

fields.name: Estimated_Trade_Value_Before_Inspection
fields.fieldText: Estimated Value of Trade In before visual and running inspection
